characters.name: Autumn Blaze
characters.description: Autumn Blaze is a female Kirin who first appears as a supporting character in the season eight episode Sounds of Silence.

characters.name: Fern Flare
characters.description: Appears in Sounds of Silence as one of the Kirin. Shares her design with S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #8, S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #10, and S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #2.

characters.name: Rain Shine
characters.description: Appears in Sounds of Silence as the leader of the Kirin. Also appears in The Ending of the End - Part 2. She is a character in Gameloft's mobile game. Her in-game description states, "The leader of the Perilous Peaks' community of Kirin, Rain Shine played a decisive role in the Stream of Silence incident... and will help her neighbors through its undoing." Voiced by Nicole Bouma.

characters.name:
Composed Kirin
S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #1
characters.description: Appears in Sounds of Silence as one of the Kirin. Also appears in The Last Problem. Shares her design with S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #6, S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #9, S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #3, and S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #4. She is a character called "Composed Kirin" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her in-game description states, "This Kirin feels super terrible about the fateful fight she started... but we're sure, when she chooses to speak, that she'll work through it just fine!"

characters.name:
Calm Kirin
S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #2
characters.description: Appears in Sounds of Silence as one of the Kirin. Shares his design with S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #4 and S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #5. He is a character called "Calm Kirin" in Gameloft's mobile game. His in-game description states, "This Kirin was a proud retailer of artisan vases... until he entered the Stream of Silence. After that, he was more of an APATHETIC retailer of artisan vases."

characters.name:
Cool Kirin
S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #3
characters.description: Appears in Sounds of Silence as one of the Kirin. Shares her design with S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #7 and S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #1. She is a character called "Cool Kirin" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her in-game description states, "After dampening her own emotions, this Kirin found it a lot harder to convince her neighbors to buy her fruit. Which is a shame, because it's really tasty fruit!"

characters.name: S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #4
characters.description: Appears in Sounds of Silence as one of the Kirin. Shares his design with S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #2 and S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #5.

characters.name: S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #5
characters.description: Appears in Sounds of Silence as one of the Kirin. Shares his design with S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #2 and S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #4.

characters.name: S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #6
characters.description: Appears in Sounds of Silence as one of the Kirin. Shares her design with S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #1, S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #9, S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #3, and S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #4.

characters.name: S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #7
characters.description: Appears in Sounds of Silence as one of the Kirin. Shares her design with S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #3 and S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #1.

characters.name:
Collected Kirin
S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #8
characters.description: Appears in Sounds of Silence as one of the Kirin. Also appears in The Last Problem. Shares her design with Fern Flare, S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #10, and S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #2. She is a character called "Collected Kirin" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her in-game description states, "This Kirin feels really bad about the fateful fight she started. Hopefully, with the help of her friends, she'll forgive herself one day!"

characters.name: S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #9
characters.description: Appears in Sounds of Silence as one of the Kirin. Shares her design with S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #1, S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #6, S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #3, and S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #4.

characters.name: S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #10
characters.description: Appears in Sounds of Silence as one of the Kirin. Shares her design with Fern Flare, S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #8, and S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #2.

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #1
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem in future Canterlot. Shares her design with S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #3 and S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #7.

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #2
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem in future Canterlot. Shares her design with Fern Flare, S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #8, and S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #10.

characters.name:
Kirin Friendship Student
S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #3
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem as a future student at the School of Friendship. Shares her design with S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #1, S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #6, S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #9, and S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #4. She is a character named "Kirin Friendship Student" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her in-game bio states "The School of Friendship's future student body consists of creatures of all kinds--including some no longer bound by silence."

characters.name: S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #4
characters.description: Appears in The Last Problem as a future resident of Ponyville. Shares her design with S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #1, S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #6, S08E23 Unnamed Kirin #9, and S09E26 Unnamed Kirin #3.
